text.section:
The Board shall waive the requirements for licensure for an applicant to practice clinical marriage and family therapy if the applicant:
Is licensed or certified as a clinical marriage and family therapist in another state, territory, or jurisdiction that has requirements that are equivalent to or exceed the requirements of § 17-303 of this subtitle;
Submits an application on the form that the Board requires; and
Pays to the Board the application fee set by the Board.
The Board shall adopt regulations to implement this section.
